isis.stitle: AIR CONDITIONING BASIC THEORY, SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS AND SERVICE (with R-134a Refrigerant System) - SPECIAL TOOLS - FIN STRAIGHTENER

svcproc.title: FIN STRAIGHTENER
svcproc.para: A fin straightener is a six-in-one tool used to clean and straighten condenser and evaporator coil fins (refer to Figure 66). Each comb section is identified with a number indicating the spacing of the fins (fins/inch) to be straightened with that section. Two fin straighteners are available to cover 16 different fin spacings. Part number ZTSE4621 is designed for 8, 9, 10, 12, 14, and 15 fins per inch. Part number ZTSE4622 is designed for 10.5, 11, 13, 18, 20, and 22 fins per inch.
